tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been visiting the Doctor from about 8 years. It started with high Gestational diabetics but eventually I got to know that I am type -2 diabetic. I have delivered two babies through normal delivery under her guidance. She is so supportive with me through out this 8 yrs giving encouragement and support and lead me in proper direction in controlling diabetics. When I am not caring for myself and taking care of kids more, she made me understand how important is mothers health to take care of baby and brought me back in track. She visited me personally to check how I am doing in the delivery room. This means a lot to me. She did not restrict to just giving me medicines. She treated me as a child. For me she is walking GOD. Without her proper direction I couldn't deliver my kids safely and with proper health.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She patiently went thru all my records. And explained my illness. Gave me a lot of confidence. A very positive doctor and does not scare u  as most of them do now.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Swollen Lymph Nodes,Thyroid Swelling,Cold Sores,Restless Leg Syndrome,
review: ********* ****** she was very helpful and gv me the best advice n told me what needs to be done thank you God bless

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: She is very cordial and very patiently heard all the problems explained. She didn't create any panic and told positively to address all the issues. Happy with initial interaction and medicine suggested.
